analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/23/0x6cbadb622d30a8c998c907911a9b160e735348fc.sol:
	Contract BitEspritCoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/23/0x6cbadb622d30a8c998c907911a9b160e735348fc.sol#224-226)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/23/0x6cbadb622d30a8c998c907911a9b160e735348fc.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/23/0x6cbadb622d30a8c998c907911a9b160e735348fc.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/23/0x6cbadb622d30a8c998c907911a9b160e735348fc.sol#88) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of BitEspritCoin.burn (/unique_chucks/23/0x6cbadb622d30a8c998c907911a9b160e735348fc.sol#234) is not in mixedCase
